description:
Get ready for the STORY OF SEASONS series' very first mystery scenario!

* The sub-scenarios are small sets of quests, events, and outfits that are separate from the main game's scenario.

[Summary]
Strange incidents are happening all over Olive Town! It's up to you, Mikey, and Cindy to shed some light on these mysterious events. Get ready for the STORY OF SEASONS series' very first mystery scenario!
name: Olive Town Mystery Files
